subject: Baseball
Hoaxes and Pranks
lead_paragraph: Backman, the manager of the Class AAA Las Vegas 51s, has played practical jokes on some of his players when they have been called up to the major leagues with the Mets.
snippet: Backman, the manager of the Class AAA Las Vegas 51s, has played practical jokes on some of his players when they have been called up to the major leagues with the Mets.
